publicHearings.title: RZ 21-02: Rezoning for 11 Ravinia Drive (First Read)
publicHearings.description: First read of rezoning for 11 Ravinia Drive to amend conditions of current PC-2c District to allow furniture retail showroom and concurrent variance from street frontage requirements. Council requested applicant explore better tree protection, sustainable design, and installation of wayfinding signage and public art. No public comments for or against.
